name: Space Aces (sounderdisc)
description:
Space Aces is the video game we made for the spring 2022 offering of CAP 4053 at UCF. The basic concept of our game is that the player controls a space fighter capable of movement in 3 directions and rotation in 3 directions. The game supports any controller, keyboard, and the Thrustmaster 1600M flight stick specifically. See readme.txt for controls.

Team Members:

Matthew Hubbs - Project Lead, Flight Control System, & Enemy AI

Austin Brooks - Laser Weapon, Cockpit UI, & Music and Sound Effects

Bradley Vanderzalm - Mothership Hyperspace Sequence & Procedural Asteroid Generation

Keon Bush - Main Menu
